row.entry: This value setsystem is used to specify the action referred by a consent directive. the type of consent directive, e.g., to consent or dissent to collect, access, or use in specific ways within an EHRS or for health information exchange; or to disclose health information for purposes such as research.

This value set is used to specify the disclosure or use action associated with a privacy consent directive. The readers are encouraged to refer to the source value set definitions for a comprehensive description and explanation of codes.
